NAEB Region II Conference
March 29 - 30,1963
Program
FRIDAY, MARCH 29
(All Friday events at the International Inn, Tampa)
REGISTRATION
9:00-12:00 A.M. Lobby
LUNCHEON
12:00-1:30 P.M. Crystal Room
CHAIRMAN: O. Leonard Press, Region II
Radio Director

NAEB Board and Director,
WOSU, Columbus, Ohio
SUBJECT: "The Role of Educational Radio
in the Age of Educational
Television"
RADIO CONFERENCE SESSION
11:00-12:00 A.M. and 2:00-5:00 P.M.
CHAIRMAN: Dr. Kenneth Wright, Director
of Broadcasting, University of
Tennessee.
CONSULTANTS: Graydon Ausmus, University of

Haskell Boyter, WETV-TV,
Atlanta, Georgia
E. G. Burrows, WUOM, Ann
Arbor, Michigan
